description: landscape with road at right; water with sailboats at left; tall bluff in URC with building on top and birds to left of bluff; three figures in foreground on road with two other figures in background
inscription:
Title and Inscription

URC of image, in pencil: [Cast di Barbarosa (?)]
medium: Pen and blue and black ink on wove paper
provenance: [Walter Schatzki, New York, by 1974; sold February 16, for $45, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC below image, in blue: [Capri preso da Annacapri]; URC, in pencil: [Capri da Anacapri]
title: View of Capri from Anacapri
